START_Tokyo_Skytree.scene_description: A breathtaking view of the Tokyo Skytree at night. Sky illuminated with the glistering tower lights. Shadow the hedgehog is seen observing his surroundings.

Shadow_the_hedgehog.description: Fast shoes, faster attitude, slow on friendliness.

interactions.talk: Shadow murmurs, 'Gotta find a way to that bank.'
interactions.look: He's studying a map, looking serious.

Tokyo_Skytree.description: A magnificent steel giant kissing the starry night sky.

interactions.look: It's beautiful, towering above everything else.
interactions.use: Shadow says, 'Can't use this. Too conspicuous.'

Path_to_bank.description: A shadowy path secretly leading to a distant bank.

interactions.look: This path... it's perfect for a subtle approach.
interactions.use: Shadow bolts down the path, vanishing in the darkness.

START_Tokyo_Skytree.hint: 'Hedgehog and a Map, what could go wrong?'

Bank_Heist_Scene.scene_description: A secluded bank surrounded by the quiet city night. Shadow arrives from a hidden entrance, poised for a heist.

Bank.description: Prime target. Chuckles in the face of normalcy.

interactions.look: 'Looks secure. Just the way I like it.'
interactions.use: Shadow grins, 'Time to have a little fun.'

interactions.look: 'Its dark and cold. Just what I need.'

Security_Guard.description: Sleep deprived and irritated. Well, this is awkward.

interactions.talk: 'Hey, you're not supposed to be here!'
interactions.look: 'This guy is going to be annoying...'
